1.0.name: wordpress/pinterest-tabs
1.0.description:
Use this plugin to show your Pinterest on your Wordpress site and Facebook tab.

Pinterest Tab 1. Engage users to spread your brand on Pinterest. 2. Add it to your fan page. 3. Works on mobile. 4. Boards & Pins 5. Users stay in your environment 6. Easy Setup.

We also offer 14 days free trial of Pinterest Contest.
